summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3310, for the improvement of the alley in block 15, University Park Addition, being the alley between 15th Avenue Northeast and 16th Avenue Northeast, from East 47th Street to East 50th Street, all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 40981 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
